name: Price Of Fuzzy Dice
description:
Price Of Fuzzy Dice is a Fuzzy Dice Simulator Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Oh no! Our heroic dice have been knocked off of their prize counter case and need to earn enough tickets to open the case again! Traverse Teddy's Arcaderia, Play Arcade Games, and earn enough tickets to reclaim your prize case!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Walk around

MOUSE - Move the camera

SPACE BAR - Jump

SHIFT - Launch Dice

A Game By Agreafel, Cheemis, Cheese, Interflash, UGU BUGU, & Yormi
